bannedDependencies.message: Scala 2.10/2.11 dependencies are not allowed for Scala 2.12 builds. This can be caused by hard-coded scala versions, where the 'scala.binary.version' property should be used instead.

patterns.pattern: Licensed to the Apache Software Foundation (ASF) under one

bannedDependencies.message: Older snakeyaml versions are not allowed due to security vulnerabilities.
Older jackson versions are not allowed due to security vulnerabilities.
Log4j 1 and Reload4J dependencies are not allowed because they conflict with Log4j 2. If the dependency absolutely requires the Log4j 1 API, use 'org.apache.logging.log4j:log4j-1.2-api'.
Direct dependencies on flink-rpc-akka are not allowed. Depend on flink-rpc-akka-loader instead, and use RpcSystem#load or the TestingRpcService.
Direct dependencies on flink-table-planner are not allowed. You should depend on either Table API modules or flink-table-planner-loader.
